alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Seneca, northern Schuyler, eastern Yates, Cayuga, northwestern Cortland, southern Onondaga, north central Steuben and northern Tompkins Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Throopsville to Romulus to Branchport. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Syracuse, Auburn, Pompey, Penn Yan, Hector, Romulus, Fayette, Owasco, Sennett and Starkey. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 13 and 15, and near 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central New York.

area.areaDesc: Cortland; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins; Yates
